name: Twitter Bot Downloader
description: Web App that makes easy to download videos from the social network Twitter. It uses the twitter official API. I wanted to do it for my own use and so I do very often.

name: Memory Card Game
description: In this game you must memorize the position of the cards and match them. My sister gave me this idea when I wanted to make a simple game with React.

name: Pomodoro technique Timer
description: You can use this timer to study following the pomodoro technique setting the time in intervals of work and rest.

name: Web Sockets Chat
description: Just write an user name and a room number to talk with all the others within the same room.
